Job Description:
Job Description: 

 We are seeking an architect for leading DevOps and Web development.  Candidate should have a proven track record of implementing continuous integration, delivery/ release frameworks and developing web based solutions with tight security.

• Sustained passion to persistently engage towards building world- class standards in operational excellence
